about_the_game:
About This Game

Survive. Explore. Craft. Build. Thrive.

Stranded after a massive storm, you wash ashore on Paloma Island, an uncharted wilderness brimming with danger and opportunity. To survive, you must adapt, craft, build, and explore while uncovering the secrets hidden across this lush yet treacherous open world.

Key Features

Immersive Survival Mechanics

  • Manage hunger, thirst, stamina, and health while navigating the island’s harsh conditions.

  • Hunt animals for food and resources, but beware—wildlife can attack both you and each other, creating unpredictable encounters.

  • Adapt to changing weather and the realistic day-night cycle, where every moment counts.

Advanced Crafting and Building Systems

  • Gather materials like wood, stone, and metal to craft tools, weapons, and equipment.

  • Build and upgrade your shelter with modular components, adding defenses, storage, and crafting stations.

  • Create customized furniture, lighting, and decorations to make your base truly your own.

Dynamic Exploration and Transport

  • Explore diverse biomes, including dense forests, towering cliffs, snow-capped mountains, and abandoned ruins.

  • Utilize vehicles for faster travel or transport resources across the island.

  • Saddle up and ride horses to traverse the terrain quickly and efficiently, with unique animations and interactions.

Fishing and Farming Systems

  • Cast your line into rivers and oceans to catch fish using bait like worms or crafted lures.

  • Cultivate crops on customizable farmland, ensuring a steady supply of food and resources.

  • Fertilize and water your plants to improve yields and sustain your survival.

Hunting and Wildlife

  • Stalk and hunt animals like deer, boars, and wolves for food, pelts, and crafting materials.

  • Beware of predators, which can attack both you and other animals, creating dynamic wildlife interactions.

  • Use traps and stealth to improve your chances of successful hunts.

Skill Progression and Customization

  • Unlock and improve skills to enhance your survival abilities, such as crafting efficiency, combat techniques, and stamina management.

  • Progress through a detailed skill tree that rewards exploration, crafting, and combat mastery.

  • Tailor your character’s abilities to fit your playstyle, whether you prefer stealth, combat, or resource gathering.

Challenging Combat and Enemies

  • Engage in melee and ranged combat with crafted weapons, including spears, bows, and firearms.

  • Lay traps, fortify your defenses, and strategize against both wildlife and intelligent enemies.

  • Fight with skill and precision using dynamic hit reactions and blocking mechanics.

A Living Ecosystem

  • Witness a dynamic world where animals interact, hunt, and defend their territory.

  • Explore a visually stunning environment brought to life with interactive foliage, diverse wildlife, and a realistic ecosystem.

Interactive Vehicles and Mounts

  • Repair and use vehicles to transport resources, navigate rugged terrain, or escape danger.

  • Tame, ride, and care for horses, giving you a fast and reliable way to traverse the island’s vast landscape.

Will you adapt to the ever-changing challenges of Paloma Island and uncover its secrets, or will the wild claim you as its own? The choice is yours in this expansive open-world survival adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended to improve loading times and overall performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: SSD
